title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: URF??? Extremely disgusted Riot, you've had every other game mode 3 times since URF was on last. Rotating game mode? URF is now Yorick, he's never on rotation. You clearly know that URF is immensely popular, because every bloody time you post "Rotating game mode queue is now live!" the top comments are "URF???". Please don't keep the only good thing from the other shitty modes and toxic community.
couldn't have said it better myself
log in here just for upvote this thread.
Logged in to upvote. One of these days, they will actually listen.

I would really enjoy it if riot brought back urf each full rotation of every second rotation even. They would keep their player base high and it wouldn't diminish the value of URF. Instead, they decide to bring out ascension every second week in a way of forcing us to enjoy it.
I used to be angry but now I'm just disappointed. {{champion:32}}
And still no urf....{{item:3070}}

Warwick killed Urf the Manatee and now Riot is killing URF the gamemode. 

Please don't be a Warwick and be smart.
i just can't figure out why riot is not bringing back doom bots
WE want URF back!!!!{{item:3070}}
Looks like Riot are taking a page out of Jagex's handbook and ignoring their community.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Idk why everyone complains that URF isn't on enough. If it was on too often then it would become extremely boring. The thing that makes you want it so bad is because it isn't being given to you every week, and if you got it every week then you wouldn't appreciate the game mode as much. Also Riot said that URF was still only going to be on a couple times a year and you complaining about it in their posts isn't going to change their schedule.

Dude everyone is complaining that we haven't had it for 4 months, not that we don't have it every other week. And also Riot said that we would see Urf 'at least twice this year' so there is expectation for more. Because we don't have Urf, it's replaced by all the boring game modes that we have had every other week that like you said have become boring from over using it on the Rgm queue

"If it was on too often then it would become extremely boring."

URF has been on twice this year.

Twice.

"URF has only been on twice this year" -ImCoolz
"URF will be on at least twice this year" -Riot Games
See the connection?
i hate you rito. BRING BACK URF.{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
{{champion:103}}
plz we want Urf :(((((
Are we gonna get that black market gamemode again?
we most likely wont get urf until next year. yay poro king.....{{summoner:30}}
